items.sentence: When Tom was a young boy, he used to love climbing trees.
When she returned to her room, the diamond ring was gone.
Tom finished writing the report in less than three hours.
Tom had no choice but to do what the boss told him to do.
Would you please tell Tom why you don\'t want to do that?
Wouldn\'t it be better if Tom did that with someone else?
I\'m supposed to pay my rent on the first of every month.
I\'m the only one who knows where Tom hid the gold coins.
I\'ve made up my mind to give back all the money I stole.
Tom hopes to inherit a lot of money when his mother dies.
